state_description: This screen allows users to manage the list of applications that automatically open every time the user logs in. Users can enable or disable these login items to optimize system performance.

enables.name: Toggle Login Item
enables.description: Enable or disable a specific login item to control whether it opens automatically at login.

enables.name: Sort Login Items
enables.description: Sort the list of login items by name or status to organize the view.

enables.name: Navigate to Launch Agents
enables.description: Switch to the Launch Agents section to manage background processes.

enables.name: Navigate to Heavy Consumers
enables.description: Switch to the Heavy Consumers section to identify and manage resource-intensive applications.
